data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Janjgir-Champa, Chhattisgarh, India today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Janjgir-Champa, Chhattisgarh, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please give every church in the county of Janjgir-Champa a passion to plant another simple church.
Spirit, encourage the church of Janjgir-Champa, Chhattisgarh, India that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Janjgir-Champa you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Kamar people.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Janjgir-Champa, Chhattisgarh, India. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 1,619,700 people living in Janjgir-Champa.
Father, help your children in Janjgir-Champa, Chhattisgarh, India find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

location.name: Janjgir-Champa
location.people_groups_list: Chamar Satnami, Yadav Kaonra, Mali (Hindu traditions), Dhobi Kathiya
